scripts.db:sugarfoot:migrate: cd apps/sugarfoot && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:sugarfoot:migrate:deploy: cd apps/sugarfoot && npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.db:sugarfoot:seed: cd apps/sugarfoot && npx prisma db seed
scripts.docker:sugarfoot:up: docker-compose up sugarfoot-db -d && docker run --rm -p 3000:3000 --network fubs_microservices-network -e DATABASE_URL=postgresql://postgres:postgres@sugarfoot-db:5432/sugarfoot_db?schema=public -e NODE_ENV=production -e JWT_SECRET=your-secret-key-for-development -e JWT_EXPIRES_IN=7d fubs-sugarfoot
